title: Sons of Mayhem 3: War and Vengeance
description: SONS OF MAYHEM 3: WAR AND VENGEANCEThere’s a time for peace and a time for war. There’s a time to forgive and forget, to negotiate and make amends, to make agreements and agree to let sleeping dogs lie. And then there are times when you have to gather your crew, grab your weapons and kick some serious *** ass.“War and Vengeance” is the third part of the Sons of Mayhem serial. It is a novella length 23,000 word story which continues where part 2 left off. It is the third of four parts.You should read the first two parts first if you haven’t already!Part 4 coming soon.
author: Nikki Pink
